english.segment1: Can I ask one question. Before our lips collide?. Will you still be by my side. When clouds fall from the sky?
english.segment2: If it's love then surely it's strong enough. To carry us to bed. Eyes shut with rested heads
english.segment3: Tell me that I shouldn't fall for you. Tell me that this happened way too soon
english.segment4: Baby, you amaze me. Why would i ever leave. For another one?. We can't stand the same movies and horrible bands. Why would I ever hold hands. With another one?
english.segment5: There's no rhyme or reason. For calling up this late. Just like me you're still awake. Watching conan or checking space
english.segment6: Your car is blasting. Songs we've stole. Before they hit the shelves. We'll predict how they sell. (And they'll sell.. oh, they'll sell)
english.segment7: Baby, you amaze me. Why would i ever leave. For another one?. We can't stand the same movies and horrible bands. Why would I ever hold hands. With another one?
english.segment8: You have this smile (i'm lucky to be yours). That spans for days (for you i will..). I've stayed awake not knowing whether you. Will call me.
english.segment9: Tell me that I shouldn't fall for you. Tell me that this happened way to soon. Tell me that I shouldn't fall for you. Oh god I fall for you.
